Priority of Service<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">The organization has documented continuity planning policy and procedures.<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Comment omitted<\/td><\/tr><tr><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Control: M00302 - Contingency Plan<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">The organization has a documented disaster recovery\/ business continuity plan that identified critical business functions and provides recovery objectives and defines responsibilities. The plan is reviewed, updated, and approved periodically or when there are significant change to people, process, or technology.<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Comment omitted<\/td><\/tr><tr><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Control: M00304 - Telecommunications Services<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">The organization conducts capacity planning so that necessary capacity for information processing, telecommunications, and environmental support exists during contingency operations.<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Comment omitted<\/td><\/tr><tr><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Control: M00305 - Contingency Plan<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">The organization has a documented disaster recovery\/ business continuity plan that identified critical business functions and provides recovery objectives and defines responsibilities. The plan is reviewed, updated, and approved periodically or when there are significant change to people, process, or technology.<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Comment omitted<\/td><\/tr><tr><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Control: M00278 - Alternate Processing - Storage Site<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">The organization has an alternate facility that can be utilized during contingency operations.<\/td><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Comment omitted<\/td><\/tr><tr><td nobr=\"true\" style=\"vertical-align:middle;\" align=\"left\">Control: * M00284 -
